\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMar 21, 2013 @ 9:03pm\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tFirst Impressions Vid\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tThought this might help out anyone interested in seeing some actual gameplay before they buy it. It\'s a promissing game. Hope the devs keep on the ball with getting multiplayer working. That\'s really key to having this be a winner.

http://youtu.be/S35PuHLQ4ZU\t
\r\n\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tNot sure the discount is a copout. I don\'t think it is. I think they\'re just following a simmilar marketing plan like MC did, start the community before the game is actually "released" and sell it at a low price point.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#4\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tCerise Sorbet\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMar 22, 2013 @ 11:06am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tYeah, the $10 offer hasn\'t changed since the debut last fall. There really wasn\'t a good way to sell something like this here until the brand new early access program, so LL was selling thru its own site instead, but using Steam for delivery.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Since I posted the devs have posted welcome news on this forum anyway. There is activity on the devs forums, it is just a little obscured by the forum format (find the recent posts link[community.buildpatterns.com] ).\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tMy first impression was pretty positive, but they really haven\'t updated much for like a month now. I was hoping that they\'d add to the game a bit more by now. If you like minecraft, this is a good diversion atm, maybe worth it once they get multiplayer going. That having been said, I haven\'t played it for a week, maybe they have updated it since then.\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMar 23, 2013 @ 11:14am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tThe camera feels a little restricive right now\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tI\'m referring to the free camera, not the third person view. It\'s obvious this was intended more for building and harvesting, but whenever my character goes offscreen because the camera was rotated underneath him, it immediately tries to focus on him again. This is very annoying when trying to build a bridge.

I\'d prefer the ability to be able to rotate him offscreen if I like, to make it easier to reach that one spot I\'d never be able to build from otherwise.

EDIT: Or failing that, make the object transparent so you can still see him.\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by [UGUF] Merkules;\r\n\t\tMar 23, 2013 @ 12:18pm\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tLet us build off of objects not attached to the world\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMore Than One Monitor\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

All trademarks are property of their respective owners in the US and other countries.\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPrivacy Policy\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t |  Legal\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t |  Steam Subscriber Agreement\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t |  Refunds\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tNov 1, 2014 @ 10:00am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tTaking the money and running away?\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tGood f-ing job!
"Yeah, we took the money from you for the full product but now we don\'t feel like developing it anymore, so...you know...go f*ck yourself our dear customer."
No compensation not even an apology. Your company just doesn\'t have ANY shame what so ever, does it?

I\'ll make sure to let as many people as possible know how your company treats it\'s customers.
Hopefully your business will crash and burn.\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n
\r\n\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t[UGUF] Merkules\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2015 @ 8:47am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tI have been a Second Life user since 2008. I love that world, but unless LL gets their heads out of their asses, I hope everything they claim to work on suffers. Everything and everyone.

EDIT: By the way LL, this means you lost one of your earliest customers. Nice job \xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5 that up.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by Doc Scratch;\r\n\t\tJan 14, 2015 @ 8:48am\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t 8\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\thow much longer will the multiplayer servers be up\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tWhat happened to the original gameplay mode?\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tWhat they owe us is far more than just store credit. They failed us and we don\'t deserve to be anally \xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5\xe2\x99\xa5 again. What we deserve is a full refund of every cent ever spent on anything that has at any point been under LL\'s influence in any way.

That\'s the least they can do to start.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMar 22, 2013 @ 6:50pm\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tMore Than One Monitor\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tIs this where we post bugs/suggestions?

When playing the game full screen, I\'ve noticed that clicking anywhere on my second monitor not only minimizes the game, but it also "locks in" any keyboard keys I was pressing when the game minimized. Usually that means my character has run off a cliff and died by the time I get back in. Not okay in 2013.

Please either fully capture the mouse or (preferrably) don\'t minimize when the game loses focus. With how much the mouse is used in the game, it\'s far too easy to click off the screen.

Also, the order of the video resolution options doesn\'t make any sense.\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n

\r\n \t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tbuildpatterns\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t [developer]\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMar 23, 2013 @ 1:22am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tHeya!

Thank you for the feedback. Though we may not be able to reply to every post, we are reviewing and reading through the feedback and suggestions here as we develop the game further. Keep the comments coming!
\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tThanks for responding. Even token acknowledgements go a long ways in an environment like this.

Keep up the good work! I look forward to seeing where this game goes.\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMar 22, 2013 @ 11:05am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tFeedback\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tI have played the game two hours and found no goals (there are no dangers or conditions to survive). Without goals my motivation goes down to play this game. Only creating shapes and patterns to build something without reaching goals, e.g. achievements or to unlock new levels, is boring after some time.

Here my suggestions:
- Need little and big goals to reach, e.g. to unlock new levels.
- Achievements, e.g. for the greatest collapse, the biggest build structure...
- Riddles to solve.
- NPCs, e.g. animals or other mobs (because the worlds so empty)
- Multiplayer (but what to do together?)

Best Regards,
neo

\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n

\r\n\t\t\t\tPS: I found some goals (http://build-patterns.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Formations) but the game don\'t tell me that there are those things. Suggestion: Implement some hints so the player know there is more :)\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tNo mobs please. :) I do not want to kill anything in Patterns. I like the relaxing atmospshere.
Some animals/npcs are ok.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t [developer]\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMar 22, 2013 @ 11:33am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tThanks for this thread! As mentioned in our welcome thread - as genesis release users, your feedback will help shape Pattern\xe2\x80\x99s evolution. Please keep the comments, screenshots, videos and your thoughts coming! Know that we are reading and paying attention to your feedback, even if we are not able to respond to every post with a comment.

If you encounter a bug with the Patterns genesis release, please report it to us directly through http://www.buildpatterns.com/support so that we can investigate and address it.

We\xe2\x80\x99ll continue to frequently update Patterns with new features, performance improvements, bug fixes, and more, so please check in regularly to keep up to date with the latest!
\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tI agree that it needs goals and some more things to do. When it comes to monsters, etc. the players should have an option to turn them off if they want to maybe? Looking forward to seeing this game get bigger & better!\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\tPatterns is more fun with friends\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\tWill this game having survival mode later ? and a question about rotation..\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tI like this game and I have 3 question...

1. What is the furture future update in this game? Because of monster , will it contain life icon and will it getting hunger for realistic mode? { May be eat battery or block for life :D }

2. I don\'t know is that my problem, sometime when I moving things , rotation not really well ...
Can\'t rotate it to right direction ,,, Everytime I need to make a big base and like glue it :/

3. The improtant one ... Some of my saved map can\'t load again , it ....loading to 25 % and takes forever ..... What can I do ..... One robot I bu about 3 days.....

Anyway, Good game thx for developer ..... (My bad English >< )\t
\r\n\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tApr 28, 2014 @ 5:25pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tAt this time we do not have a "survival mode" planned for Patterns.

In the next update we have completely re-done the controls for selecting and editing shapes and groups of shapes. You will be able to access these features by right clicking on the shape.

In the future we are working to expand on the options for LUA scripting so that players can create their own survival maps to share on the Cosmos for others to play.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by BuildPatterns:
At this time we do not have a "survival mode" planned for Patterns.

In the next update we have completely re-done the controls for selecting and editing shapes and groups of shapes. You will be able to access these features by right clicking on the shape.

In the future we are working to expand on the options for LUA scripting so that players can create their own survival maps to share on the Cosmos for others to play.

Will there be a way to kill other players anytime soon, or maybe in a later update?\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tPvP is something that the team is thinking about, but so far nothing is firmly planned.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDoes game developement stall?\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPatterns is more fun with friends\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t 1\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tAfter this update ... I can\'t remove the selction toggle hud for screenshot\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tThe Patterns team is still hard at work on new features for our fans. For the latest news and updates please follow us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/buildpatterns) and our official forums (http://www.patternsguru.com/forums) so you don\'t miss any big announcements!\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tWould be good if you will publish some update too.
"Make a commit everey day rule" is not works here, but similar philosophy should be applied.
You got a lot of unfinished things which you have started to do, but stall. Like Races, like Wires, like Portals. Finish off one of that thing, make an update and so on. You are not Mojang with their 50kk users who will wait for HUGE update for a year.\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tAnd where are a new updates, features, changes? Or you management decide to stop the project and send all the money back to users?\'
One post in a week and three updates per year means something like that.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by icallmyselfi;\r\n\t\tOct 22, 2013 @ 12:04pm\t\t
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tAnthony\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tOct 29, 2013 @ 11:23am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tLuck led me to this post!

I had been considering throwing down some $$$ (Dollars, not strings) towards this awesome looking sandbox. But alas, all the data I found (until this thread) showed the last update being August 22nd.

Needless to say I am not one to throw help towards something that is not being produced!

^^^^^^ All of that, is a fancy way to suggest that the wiki (or any of the other "official pages") should maybe sorta have this information on it...

PS: I am NOT complaining in the least. Since I DID find the information, I am quite happy. And my wallet is 10 strings--err dollars lighter. But other folks might not be as "hard core" at hunting down the information.

PPS: This game has GREAT POTENTIAL FOR AWESOMENESS. If this early access is anything to shout about, we are all going to have sore throats by the time beta/full release is out.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#5\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJason\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tOct 29, 2013 @ 8:32pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Anthony:
Luck led me to this post!

I had been considering throwing down some $$$ (Dollars, not strings) towards this awesome looking sandbox. But alas, all the data I found (until this thread) showed the last update being August 22nd.

Needless to say I am not one to throw help towards something that is not being produced!

^^^^^^ All of that, is a fancy way to suggest that the wiki (or any of the other "official pages") should maybe sorta have this information on it...

PS: I am NOT complaining in the least. Since I DID find the information, I am quite happy. And my wallet is 10 strings--err dollars lighter. But other folks might not be as "hard core" at hunting down the information.

PPS: This game has GREAT POTENTIAL FOR AWESOMENESS. If this early access is anything to shout about, we are all going to have sore throats by the time beta/full release is out.

(not trying to self promote) but I started making youtube videos when the game came out a bit over a year ago and got videos of every build if you want to check out how the game has evolved over the last year. (mygameplaying is the channel) There are quite a lot of awesome changes! :D

if you want to play online with me just add me!


And developers of Patterns, not sure if I ever asked you too, but add me if you want to play! Would be absolutely honored if I had a gameplay vid with some of you in it! :D\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMay 9, 2014 @ 11:11am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tHere we go, this is my feedback about the update\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tWell guys, I\'ve made a few feedbacks before so I think i can make a few more, that\'s no problem for me, this is a game I like and I want to help you to improve it in every aspect.

First of all, congratulations, you\'ve made nice on the new UI, It\'s easier than the old one and I found that now we can play in first person without problem, nice hotkeys assignations.

Using rightclick on placed patterns thing is amazing too, we can move or rotate them VERY easy, before It was awful.

Login, and main new interface, well... It\'s nice, not neccesary at the moment but nice, I like it but this doesn\'t add gameplay at the moment, and the players want to play!

Another thing, I\'m very dissapointed with the time you need to make this update, hope a bit faster updates in a near future.

Well, nothing else to say hope this is useful for you (:\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n
\r\n\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMay 11, 2014 @ 5:52am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tAfter this update ... I can\'t remove the selction toggle hud for screenshot\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tI use mac , I could remove the hud .... but the selction toggle...still here ... What can I do ?\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n

\r\n \t
\r\n\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSpittledrum\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMay 12, 2014 @ 9:28am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tIf by "selection toggle hud" you mean the wireframe and the save/move/rotate items when selecting an item, that should go away if you hit ESC or if you click with the left mouse button away from the selection.

If you mean the bar at the bottom of the screen with shapes and colors, to toggle that off you ned to go into "Settings" and assign a key to the "toggle hud" command (it\'s blank by default).

Hope that helps!\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by Spittledrum;\r\n\t\tMay 12, 2014 @ 4:16pm\t\t
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tDumb question time... Is that why when I look for tuts it shows an adventure mode that I can\'t find in my steam version of the game?I found old info when the game first came out apparently in 2012. It\'s very confusing . I do enjoy the building but I would love to try the adventure mode.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tInstall Steam\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlogin\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t | \r\n\t\t\t\t\t\tlanguage\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSpittledrum\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tFeb 5, 2014 @ 9:04am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tGreetings from a new member of the Patterns team\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tHello, fellow builders. I\'m very excited to be the newest member of the Patterns team at Linden Lab. I\'ll be contributing as a game designer working on systems for creativity and play and helping to answer the very apt question that someone asked below about "what is Patterns about?" More on that later.

In the meantime, while I get up to speed with the Patterns platform, I\'ll be sharing my levels to the cosmos for you to play and critique. Just go to New Game > Latest and you\'ll see some levels by "Spittledrum". These aren\'t official Linden levels or anything like that -- I just want to be transparent with my experiments in Patterns design so as to get feedback from the community and perhaps inspire others to think of new types of levels to build, just as I\'m inspired by what others build.

It\'s nice to meet you!\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n <\r\n \r\n \r\n >\r\n
\r\n
\r\n Showing 1-2 of 2 comments
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n \t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJason\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMar 26, 2014 @ 8:04pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tI think that it has nothing to do with well made maps and more to do with the tools and posisbly adding randomly generated stuff. From making puzzles in Minecraft I\'ve learnt how important solid platforming controls are and playing with the variables, like having to crouch or making you jump to a ladder instead to a platform. Stuff like buttons and ladders add more possibility to puzzles. For Patterns since you can do more than squares having a more solid differentiation between patterns and substances is important. I\'ve mentioned in my youtube videos many times the idea that there needs to be no limit to what you save as a pattern, and they should be shared since so many of the levels in the cosmos are just one big structure that should instead be shared as its own item.
It is when I build a larger shape and save it, it is then saved to that substance as well so if I want more than one 3x3 square panel (or 4x4, 5x5) just for building purposes, I have to save one for each substance. There are simply too many specific time consuming compromises I have to do right now, and once it is as easy as possible to build stuff in my mind, then it will definitely flow better. When you try to make a wheel out of isosceles triangle square pyramids, they don\'t close in on each other, and that has been the biggest obvious flaw in the game\'s creation tools since the beginning. I don\'t know what can fix it since I\'m not in the know about the game\'s development, but I do know that many times I want to build two things together and they are just a hair apart. If only there was a way to link those things together, like a liquid that turns into a solid, that would be a great solution. I\'ve been thinking out loud about these things for a long time on my Patterns videos, but I\'m not sure if that is the goal, if anyone wants to do those things, anything. I\'m really not sure about anything about this game anymore, but am still hopefull :)\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by Jason;\r\n\t\tMar 26, 2014 @ 8:05pm\t\t
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#1\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSpittledrum\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tMar 31, 2014 @ 9:08am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tGreat feedback, Jason. Rest assured, our top priority is to empower creators like yourself to make the content you dream up. To the degree that I\'m creating maps, it\'s to provide feedback to the team from the proverbial trenches and maybe to inspire others with a new design pattern or theme, just as I\'m inspired by those creators who have helped fill the Cosmos thus far.

More than just a reskin, the upcoming UI changes integrate some pretty big shortcuts to enable builders. One trick that is similar to your suggestion above is to treat a highlighted selection as a clone stamp. For example, you can highlight a 3x3 square, then shift-click any number of clones without having that configuration clutter up your inventory. This isn\'t quite the same as the multi-shape, substance-agnostic template you propose (which is a great idea, btw) but hopefully you\'ll find it useful in your builds.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#2\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tMay 5, 2014 @ 11:21am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tPreview the next update coming to Patterns\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tHi everyone! In anticipation of the next update, we want to share with you some great videos that detail all of the major changes coming in the update. Check them out at the links below:

Part 1: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eHrUKdDGJ3s
Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBRoLxcLqkc
Parts 3-4: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_pKZ9LQro4

Thank you all for your continued support and feedback!\t
